rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 31 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 7:09 AM, 22 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bataan, Batangas, Cavite, Metro Manila, Bulacan, Pampanga, Zambales, Quezon, Rizal and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
